Input:
	1.Num: 1.11011e1101
	2.Num: 1.001e-101

Expected output: 1.110101111111111110111e1101

inBinNum1: 1.11011e1101
	Whole: 1
	Frac: 11011
	Expo: 1101

inBinNum2: 1.001e-101
	Whole: 1
	Frac: 001
	Expo: -101

Frac. expo:
		11101100000000.
		0.00001001

Expo. shift: 8
		1110110000000000000000.
		000001001.

Bin subtr.:
	1110101111111111110111

Expo. shift:
	11101011111111.11110111

Redund. 0 remov.:
	11101011111111.11110111

Expo. form: 
	1.110101111111111110111e1101


Final output number: 1.110101111111111110111e1101
